posts.post_content:
Anybody have any extras, especially lower grade?  I am especially looking for T205s of Graham, Gray, and Griffith...but need/upgrade others as well.  I need a ton of T206s.  Let me know what you have for sale, with the price.  No card is too ugly if I can read the back, still need it, and can tell it's a Sovereign!

Take Care,
Geno
